revised_title: The Pigments of Pierid Butterflies: A Study of Excretory Substances Functioning in Ornament
tldr: The author investigates the pigments of Pierid butterflies and discovers that the white and yellow pigments are derived from uric acid, an excretory substance. This study contributes to the understanding of the coloration and ornamentation in butterflies, which is essential for their survival and reproduction.
